page.title: 05EDUCATION:SWANSEA WEST
page.content: My name is Cerys, I go to Primary School. On a school day, I dress in my uniform. Daddy drives me to school and I give in my homework and chat with my friends until the bell goes for assembly. Then we have Maths until break, followed by English, topic work,Music, Drama,Art,Crafts and then Games in Cwmdonkin Park. Ours is an Independent School but most of my friends go to State Schools. When I am 11, I might go to a Comprehensive School where there could be nearly 2000 children instead of 200. One Comprehensive was the first Community School in West Glamorgan, which is open for various activities out of school hours. When I am 18, I hope to go to Swansea University to study Oceanography.
